title: cannot connect to UI server MacOS[BUG]
body:
print `mlflow.tracking.get_tracking_uri()` is `http://127.0.0.1:5000`, but when run `mlflow ui`, it shows 

_/Users/yiranjing/miniconda3/lib/python3.7/site-packages/jinja2/utils.py:485: DeprecationWarning: Using or importing the ABCs from 'collections' instead of from 'collections.abc' is deprecated, and in 3.8 it will stop working
  from collections import MutableMapping
/Users/yiranjing/miniconda3/lib/python3.7/site-packages/jinja2/runtime.py:318: DeprecationWarning: Using or importing the ABCs from 'collections' instead of from 'collections.abc' is deprecated, and in 3.8 it will stop working
  from collections import Mapping
[2019-08-27 15:07:20 +1000] [10077] [INFO] Starting gunicorn 19.9.0
[2019-08-27 15:07:20 +1000] [10077] [ERROR] Connection in use: ('127.0.0.1', 5000)
[2019-08-27 15:07:20 +1000] [10077] [ERROR] Retrying in 1 second.
[2019-08-27 15:07:21 +1000] [10077] [ERROR] Connection in use: ('127.0.0.1', 5000)
[2019-08-27 15:07:21 +1000] [10077] [ERROR] Retrying in 1 second.
[2019-08-27 15:07:22 +1000] [10077] [ERROR] Connection in use: ('127.0.0.1', 5000)
[2019-08-27 15:07:22 +1000] [10077] [ERROR] Retrying in 1 second.
[2019-08-27 15:07:23 +1000] [10077] [ERROR] Connection in use: ('127.0.0.1', 5000)
[2019-08-27 15:07:23 +1000] [10077] [ERROR] Retrying in 1 second.
[2019-08-27 15:07:24 +1000] [10077] [ERROR] Connection in use: ('127.0.0.1', 5000)
[2019-08-27 15:07:24 +1000] [10077] [ERROR] Retrying in 1 second.
[2019-08-27 15:07:25 +1000] [10077] [ERROR] Can't connect to ('127.0.0.1', 5000)
Running the mlflow server failed. Please see the logs above for details._

Cannot figure out the issue, please help~ thanks!!
